name: mwc-core
description: Simplified eCommerce for WordPress by GoDaddy.
author: GoDaddy

scripts.json2po: cd languages && find . -name '*.json' ! -name 'mwc-core*.json' -execdir /bin/bash -c 'FROM="$0" && TO="mwc-core-`basename $0 .json`.po" && echo "$FROM > $TO" && ../vendor/bin/json2po mwc-core.json $FROM $TO && msgmerge --previous $TO mwc-core.pot > $TO-msgmerge && mv $TO-msgmerge $TO && if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i "" -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; else sed -i -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; fi;' '{}' \;
scripts.makepot: ./vendor/bin/wp i18n make-pot . --skip-audit --exclude=".dev,.github,.wordpress-org,build,dist,docs,node_modules,vendor,wordpress" --headers='{"Last-Translator":"plugins@godaddy.com"}' --file-comment="Copyright (c) $(date +'%Y') GoDaddy Operating Company, LLC. All Rights Reserved." languages/mwc-core.pot && npm run pot2json
